ComicInfo.Series: The Tick: Heroes of the City
ComicInfo.Summary: Contains four great features! In "Paul The Samurai & Ashley," Paul has opened a detective agency, and Ashley has decided to drop "that ninja stuff" (along with the name "Oedipus") and join Paul. The "Sally Vaccuum" story proves even though Sally has blonde hair, she's definitely no dumb bunny. In "Hand Grenade Man & The Ant," Hand-Grenade Man's power is... he's holding a hand grenade with the pin out. The Ant has... well, a lot of ant "gimmicks," including an ant larva which he keeps in his mouth. Find out how The Ant communicates... And "The Tick Short" featuring The Tick which will now be included as the fourth story in every issue of The Tick: Heroes of the City!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 11:15:42. [CVDB122463] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 16:04:42. [Issue ID 265707]

ComicInfo.Inker: Dave Garcia,Michael Avon Oeming,Nathan MacDicken,Tak Toyoshima
ComicInfo.Characters: The Tick,The Ant,Babe,Oedipus,Barry Hubris,Arthur,Paul the Samurai,Hand Grenade Man,Sally Vacuum,Man-Eating Cow,Paul Bunyan
